data.name: Charging the future of Asia: Opportunities and barriers for EV charging in Asia
data.summary: The EV charging stations market is expected to worth $38.9 Billion by 2027. The lack of charging infrastructure, including fast charging options are currently the biggest challenges to widespread EV adoption. What needs to be done to advance EV-ready infrastructure – is Asia ready to take this on?
data.speakers:
• Dr. Ali Izadi-Najafabadi, Head of Intelligent Mobility, BloombergNEF

Panellists:
• Jacques Borremans, Managing Director, APAC, CharIN E.V.
• Wybren van der Vaart, Co-Founder & Chief Executive Officer, BrightBlu
• Henrik Wigermo, Head of Governmental & External Affairs, Southeast Asia, BMW Asia
• Oren Ezer, CEO, Electreon
